General.Name: Prizma Pres Matbaacilik Yayincilik Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Prizma Pres Matbaacilik Yayincilik Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. provides printing services. It prints courses and supplementary textbooks, children's stories and fairy tale books, and question bank and test books. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: AtatUerk Organized Industrial Zone, Istanbul, Turkey
